name: mcp-server-aws-cloudwatch-logs
description: AWS CloudWatch Logs MCP server for querying and analyzing log data with CloudWatch Logs Insights

rating.reason: Exceptional documentation quality across all tools. Names are highly specific and descriptive (e.g., 'describe_log_groups', 'execute_log_insights_query'). Descriptions are comprehensive, providing clear functionality explanations, usage context, detailed return value specifications, and critical warnings about token consumption and parameter requirements. Parameter documentation is thorough with clear descriptions, constraints, examples, and important usage notes. The toolset demonstrates consistent excellence in addressing user questions proactively.
